Class SceneDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRefreshable, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class SceneDialog
extends AbstractAddDialog
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Builds the add/edit scene dialog box. It also responds to the dialog's events.
    Author:
    Martin.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
